    • Uses of RUM in network

      Methods in network with parameters of type RUM 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Network.restrictedInnerMasterProblem(RUM rum, double gamma)
      /** Important and common problem of assigning probabilities and auxiliary flows using the RUM when assuming given LoS as defined by state of the network object.
      void Network.unrestrictedMasterProblemInnerLogit(RUM rum, RefCostFun omega, double gamma)
      the unrestricted master problem, as opposed to the restricted one, does not assume that all routes in restrictedChoiceSet are used.
      void Edge.updateCost(RUM rum)
      Updates the total travel time on this edge using its current flow and the BPR formula with coefficients as specified in the [network]_net.tntp file, and then updates the generalized cost of this edge using the specified RUM.
      void Network.updateEdgeCosts(RUM rum)
      Updates the cost on edges to correspond to the current flows on them
      void OD.updatePathSizeFactors(RUM rum) 
      void Network.updatePathSizeFactors(RUM rum)
      Updates the Path Size Factors of all paths in restricted choice sets.
      void OD.updatePathSizeFactors(RUM rum, java.util.ArrayList<Path> choiceSet)
      updates the path size factors of paths in the restricted choice set of this OD.
      void Network.updatePathSizeFactorsWherePathsWereAdded(RUM rum)
      To save computation time of the relatively expensive operation of re-updating path size factors after Network.columnGeneration() in the RSUET(min,omega), this method only selectively them where a new path was introduced.
